column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I traveled by train to a visit a friend who lived a few hours from me .
#text=I planned to stay overnight , so I packed a suitcase to take with me .
#text=When I arrived at the train station , I went to the ticket counter to purchase a ticket .
#text=I looked at the schedule of departing trains and selected the time I wanted to leave .
#text=I paid for my ticket and waited .
#text=After a while , it was time for my train to depart .
#text=I went to the front of the train with other passengers .
#text=I carried my small suitcase with me .
#text=The conductor took my ticket , stamped it , and handed it back .
#text=I found a nice seat by the window and settled in for the ride .
#text=When everyone was aboard , the train announcer announced that we 'd be leaving the station .
#text=He announced where we were leaving from , and the final destination .
#text=I brought a book with me to read , and some snacks in case I got hungry .
#text=As the train traveled , I watched the scenery that went by - there were small houses and fields with cows .
#text=I enjoyed seeing places I had n't seen before .
#text=My friend picked me up at the station and we drove away in her car .
